name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log.

latch.description: Expose a second Lock Mechanism service to unlatch a Smart Lock.

port.description: Port to use for webserver receiving Nuki bridge notifications.  Default: random.

openerResetTimeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds to wait before resetting the Opener to locked.  Default: 500.  Set to 0 to keep the Opener unlocked.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a response from a Nuki bridge.  Default: 15.

form.title: Advanced Settings
form.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
